channel.title: Signoz
channel.description: Signoz is a blog about open telementry.

item.title: OpenTelemetry Logs - A Complete Introduction & Implementation
item.description: Unlike traces and metrics, OpenTelemetry logs take a different approach. In order to be successful, OpenTelemetry needs to support the existing legacy of logs and logging libraries. And this is the main design philosophy of OpenTelemetry logs....
item.author: undefined (undefined)

item.title: First page of Hacker News, 9000+ GitHub stars, improved dashboards and documentation - SigNal 17
item.description: It's time for the monthly product update of SigNoz - a full-stack open-source APM tool. Find out what we've been upto at SigNoz during September, 2022.
item.author: undefined (undefined)

item.title: OpenTelemetry Collector - architecture and configuration guide
item.description: OpenTelemetry collector provides a vendor-neutral way to collect, process, and export your telemetry data to an analysis backend of your choice. Learn how to configure..
item.author: undefined (undefined)

item.title: Monitoring OpenMetrics for Gunicorn and Django application in Prometheus
item.description: In this blog, let's see how to set up Prometheus and Grafana in EKS and how to monitor Python based applications using Prometheus.
item.author: undefined (undefined)

item.title: Monitoring Tools: Comparing Instana and Sysdig
item.description: In this blog, we compare Instana and Sysdig - two popular monitoring tools which claim to show APM metrics without need to instrument code.

item.title: The Time Machine
item.description: The Time Traveller (for so it will be convenient to speak of him) was expounding a recondite matter to us. His pale grey eyes shone and twinkled, and his usually pale face was flushed and animated...
